subject: Heating Element Defect - BLD-X1 Infrared
body:
Hello,

I purchased the BreezeLite BLD-X1 Infrared dryer on April 10, 2026, and I'm very happy with it overall.

However, I noticed yesterday that the infrared lamp inside the dryer is no longer illuminating, even though the motor and airflow function normally. This appears to be an internal component failure.

I haven't dropped the unit or exposed it to water. I've used it exactly as instructed in the manual. This seems like a manufacturing defect.

I have the purchase receipt and would appreciate assistance with a warranty claim for repair or replacement.

Thank you,
Angela Martinez
